snippet: MICHTOM--Alice, 70, a respected physician and lifelong student. Died Monday, March 7, in Ithaca, NY. Survived by brother Bill, nephew Josh, adored grandnephews Reuben and Max, and innumerable cousins, colleagues, patients, and friends who will treasure the memory of her boundless intellect and kindness. 1/3
lead_paragraph: MICHTOM--Alice, 70, a respected physician and lifelong student. Died Monday, March 7, in Ithaca, NY. Survived by brother Bill, nephew Josh, adored grandnephews Reuben and Max, and innumerable cousins, colleagues, patients, and friends who will treasure the memory of her boundless intellect and kindness. 1/3
